statements: UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 100 WHERE id = 'c684d6b4-fb40-41d2-8c29-90fae89b7c67';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET account_id = 'd7f82c44-4a76-4ccd-a604-540fb005c0ea', transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE id = 'b9e07b80-291f-48fa-bed1-f7c443d43e49';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1500.50, transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' WHERE id = '7f3635b8-84ac-4a0a-aa3f-89ff76a31e22'
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_type = 'Deposit', account_id = 'f99e9e3a-b18b-4675-ae50-5c605f2b4e0e' WHERE amount > 500 AND transaction_time < '2022-01-01'
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 150.75, merchant = 'Amazon' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE security_logs SET event = 'Login Attempt', description = 'Incorrect password entered' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 5000.00, merchant = 'Amazon', is_fraud = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE security_logs SET event = 'Login Attempt Failed', description = 'User entered incorrect password', IP_address = '192.168.1.1' WHERE log_id = 67890;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET details = 'Flagged for suspicious activity' WHERE transaction_id = 2005;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1500.00, transaction_type = 'Purchase' WHERE transaction_id = 1001
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET details = 'Under investigation', flagged_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE transaction_id = 2003
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.50, transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = 1000.75 WHERE account_id = 98765;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1000.50, transaction_date = '2023-05-10' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 500.75, account_type = 'Savings' WHERE account_id = 201;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1500.75, transaction_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.00, open_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE account_id = 2002;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, transaction_date = '2022-09-15 12:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 1000.00, open_date = '2021-05-20', customer_id = 101 WHERE account_id = 2001;
